title: Pomegranate and Poppy Seed Salad
instructions: In a large bowl , mix the romaine , onion and pomegranate_seeds .
In a small bowl , mix the remaining ingredients until well blended .
Pour over salad ; toss to coat .
Serve immediately .

title: Mother In Law Cranberry Salad Recipe
instructions: The day before the salad is to be served , mix cranberries and sugar and let set in refrigerator .
Next day , drain berries and add in all remaining ingredients .
Folding together gently .
Salad will be luscious pink color .

title: Eggplant Caviar And Parsley-Mint Salad Topping
instructions: To make the eggplant , grill over white coals until tender , about 5 minutes per side .
Peel off the skin , chop the flesh and place in a bowl .
Stir in the garlic , lemon_juice and salt .
To make the salad , combine the parsley , mint and spring_onions .
Add the lemon_juice , olive_oil , salt and pepper and toss well .
When ready to assemble , spread the eggplant caviar over the pizzas , top with the salad and serve .
Use on lemon-pepper crust .

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Combine all .
Chill and serve .

title: Grandma Freel's Cranberry Salad
instructions: Stir cranberries , sugar , and water together in a saucepan ; cook over medium heat , stirring often , until most of the berries have popped open , about 20 minutes .
Remove saucepan from heat .
Stir gelatin into the cranberries mixture until dissolved completely ; add celery , apple , and pecans and stir .
Pour into a glass 13x9-inch dish .
Refrigerate until set in the center , 10 to 12 hours .

title: Italian Orange Salad ( Kosher )
instructions: Toss oranges , red onion , spring_onions and dressing .
Spoon over lettuce on serving plate .

title: Chicken Salad
instructions: Combine chicken , celery , lemon_juice and onion and chill at least one hour .
Combine mayonnaise , salt and pepper .
Add mayonnaise mixture , grapes and almonds to chilled chicken mixture ; toss gently .
Serve chicken salad in lettuce cups .

title: Cranberry Apple Waldorf Gelatin Salad
instructions: In a large bowl , mix gelatin and sugar ; add water and stir until gelatin is completely dissolved .
Add juice ; chill in refrigerator until mixture has consistency of unbeaten egg whites .
Fold in apple , cranberries , celery , and walnuts .
Pour into a 8-inch square pan ; cover with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator until firm .
To serve , cut into squares .

title: Simple Cranberry Congealed Salad
instructions: Dissolve gelatin in water .
Add reserved pineapple juice and cool to room temperature .
Whip cranberry_sauce with beater and add to the cooled gelatin mixture along with the pineapple and toasted pecans .
Pour into gelatin mold or 9 " x 11 " serving dish .
Chill until set .
NOTE : Cooking time refers to " chilling until set " time .

title: Sesame Noodle Shrimp Salad Recipe
instructions: Prepare dressing by mixing together all ingredients - then set aside .

title: Apple and Celery Salad
instructions: Combine all ingredients and chill .
Serve on lettuce or mixed salad greens .

title: Orange and Red Onion Salad Valencia
instructions: In a large bowl , combine oranges and onion .
Add olive_oil , salt , lemon_juice and mint ; toss to coat well .
Let sit for a few minutes before serving .

title: Pretty in Pink Salad
instructions: In a mixing bowl , combine cherry filling , condensed_milk , pineapple and walnuts ; mix well .
Gently fold in whipped_topping .
Spoon into a glass serving bowl or individual parfait glasses .
Let chill before serving .

title: Mandarin Orange Salad Recipe
instructions: Mix ingredients for salad dressing ( ( combine in saucepan and boil till sugar dissolves ) .
Refrigeratefor 2 hrs .
Combine salad ingredients ( less almonds and oranges ) in bowl and chill .
Before serving add in almonds , oranges and top with dressing and toss .

title: Blueberry Lady Salad Recipe
instructions: Mix Cold Whip and cream_cheese till well blended .
Stir in blueberry pie filling .
Refrigerateat least 1 hour before serving .

title: Grilled Steak Salad
instructions: Pour 1 cup of the dressing over steak ; cover .
Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight to marinate .
Drain , discarding dressing .
Place potatoes in double layer of heavy-duty aluminum foil to form pouch ; top with remaining 1/2 cup dressing .
Place potato pouch and steak on greased grill over medium coals .
Grill 12 to 15 minutes or until medium doneness ( 160F ) , turning occasionally .
Cut steak across grain into thin strips .
Toss greens , tomato , onion , steak strips and potatoes .

title: Mandarin Orange Fruit Salad Recipe
instructions: Combine fruit with sour_cream .
Fold in coconut and marshmallows .
Refrigerate several hrs or overnight .
Don't freeze .

title: Spinach & Orange Salad
instructions: Toss spinach , oranges , onion , cheese and almonds in large bowl .
Prepare Italian_dressing as directed on envelope .
Toss with salad .

title: Lo Cal Salad Dressing Recipe
instructions: Put into qt jar .
Add in tomato juice to fill jar .
Shake well .

title: Tropical Ambrosia Salad
instructions: Mix all ingredients except coconut in bowl .
Refrigerate at least 15 minutes .
Stir in coconut just before serving .

title: Salad of Fennel , Arugula , and Ricotta Salata
instructions: Whisk shallots and lemon_juice in small bowl to blend .
Gradually whisk in oil .
Season to taste with salt and pepper .
Let stand 15 minutes to blend flavors .
Combine arugula and sliced fennel in large bowl .
Toss with enough dressing to coat salad .
Add shaved cheese ; toss gently and serve .

title: Arugula Salad
instructions: Combine shallots , lemon_juice , and honey in a large bowl ; gradually whisk in olive_oil .
Add arugula and onion to bowl ; toss gently to coat .

title: Cranberry Orange Holiday Jello Salad
instructions: Thaw cranberry orange relish if frozen .
Dissolve gelatin in water .
Stir in pineapple and relish .
Pour into mold .
Refrigerate until firm .

title: Pineapple Ambrosia Salad Recipe
instructions: Drain pineapple , reserving 2 Tbsp .
juice .
Combine bananas , grapes , coconut , marshmallows and pecans in bowl ; mix lightly .
Blend reserved pineapple juice and lowfat sour_cream in small bowl .
Pour over fruit mix ; mix well .
Refrigerate until serving time .

title: Fruit Salad
instructions: Drain fruit_cocktail and pineapple all day or overnight .
Combine with remaining ingredients .
Note : Freezes very well .

title: Dry Jello Salad Recipe
instructions: Mix all ingredients together in large bowl .
Refrigeratefor 2 hrs .
Linda says you can substitute orange Jello if you like , or possibly strawberry with pineapple and fresh strawberries .

title: Roasted Eggplant and Arugula Salad
instructions: Preheat the oven to 450 .
Pour 2 tablespoons of the oil onto a baking sheet and dip each strip of eggplant into the oil to coat .
Season the strips with salt_and_pepper .
Roast the eggplant on the bottom shelf of the oven until tender and deep brown on the underside , about 25 minutes .
Using a metal spatula , scrape up the eggplant and transfer to a plate .
In a small bowl , combine the remaining 3 tablespoons olive_oil with the balsamic_vinegar , 1/2 teaspoon salt and 1/4 teaspoon pepper .
In a large bowl , toss the arugula with 3 tablespoons of the dressing .
Transfer the salad to a platter and arrange the roasted eggplant on top .
Drizzle the eggplant with the remaining 2 tablespoons of dressing and serve .

title: Black-Bean and Yellow-Rice Salad
instructions: In a medium saucepan , heat 2 tablespoons of the oil over moderately low heat .
Add the onion and cook , stirring occasionally , until translucent , about 5 minutes .
Stir in the garlic , turmeric , cumin , 1 teaspoon of the salt , the black_pepper , and rice .
Cook , stirring frequently , for 2 minutes .
Add the water and bay_leaf ; bring to a simmer .
Reduce the heat to low and cook , covered , until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice is done , about 20 minutes .
Remove the bay_leaf .
In a large glass or stainless-steel bowl , combine the rice , beans , bell pepper , and tomatoes .
Add the remaining 1 tablespoon oil and 1/4 teaspoon salt , the vinegar , and parsley .
Toss gently to combine .
Serve with lime wedges , if using .
